/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below.

In the foreground, a blue bus adorned with yellow and white stripes is parked on the right side of the street, adding a splash of color to the scene. The street itself is lined with various buildings and shops, their facades painted in a variety of colors, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and creating a network of lines against the sky.

On the left side of the street, cars are parked neatly, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. Trees line the street, their green leaves providing a touch of nature amidst the concrete structures. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the energy and vibrancy of the city.
